title: The Hot Hand - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 3/18/20
itunes:title: The Hot Hand - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 3/18/20
description:
George Noory and Wall Street Journal reporter Ben Cohen discuss "the hot hand," a string of success and good luck, including stories of Golden State Warriors basketball star Steph Curry, famed playwright William Shakespeare and more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
